explains: n. 诱惑（物），诱惑力；鱼饵，诱饵

sentences.en: Few can resist the lure of adventure.
sentences.cn: 很少有人能抵御历险的诱惑力。

sentences.en: He attempted to lure her away from husband and family.
sentences.cn: 他企图引诱她离开丈夫和家庭。

sentences.en: In this case, the document instance lists only one lure.
sentences.cn: 在本例中，此文档例子只列出一个诱饵。
